Cheer Squad Uniform Gloves (White, Female)
kDesc
Your cheers can be seen clearly even from far away with these white gloves.\nYouth Level: ★[#Legal]
Vos encouragements peuvent être vus clairement de loin avec ces gants blancs.\nJeunesse : ★[#Legal]
Dein Beifall kann einfach gesehen werden, sogar von weitem, mit diesen weißen Handschuhen.\nJugendlichkeitslevel: ★[#Legal]
Dei guanti bianchi che mettono molto in risalto le movenze dei supporters.\nLivello giovinezza: ★[#Legal]
Tus movimientos serán visibles desde la lejanía gracias a estos guantes blancos.\nNivel de juventud: ★[#Legal]
手の動きが遠くからでもよくわかる、応援団の為の白手袋。\n青春度 ：★[#Legal]
손의 움직임을 멀리서도 잘 알 수 있는, 응원단을 위한 흰색 장갑. \n청춘도: ★[#Legal]
A pair of white gloves for the cheering team. Hand movements can be clearly visible from afar. \nYouthness: ★[#Legal]
應援團成員戴的白色手套，即使遠處也能看到手的活動。\n青春指數：★[#Legal]
